body: What plugins does Avicus use for the ranks system?
body_tagged: What plugins does Avicus use for the ranks system?
title: quick question

replies.body: It's custom coded. It only works with the Avicus/Avicore libraries.
replies.body_tagged: It's custom coded. It only works with the Avicus/Avicore libraries.

replies.body: ok, but are there any other plugins that have similar/the same ranks? used differently?
replies.body_tagged: ok, but are there any other plugins that have similar/the same ranks? used differently?

reply_to.body: It's custom coded. It only works with the Avicus/Avicore libraries.
reply_to.body_tagged: It's custom coded. It only works with the Avicus/Avicore libraries.

replies.body: PermissionsEx is a good plugin if you just want to set up ranks and permissions.
replies.body_tagged: PermissionsEx is a good plugin if you just want to set up ranks and permissions.

replies.body: Thanks, starting a server tonight, gonna try that.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, starting a server tonight, gonna try that.
